text:
The <copy .. /> statement's includeEmptyDirs attribute has a default of false.
However, if you create a target that has multiple <copy .. /> statements in it,
and set the includeEmptyDirs="true" attribute for one of them, then all
subsequent <copy .. /> statements will also include empty dirs unless you
explicity set each one of them to includeEmptyDirs="false".

I found it using the following:

<copy todir="${dest1.dir}" flatten="true" includeEmptyDirs="true">
    <fileset dir="${source1.dir}">
        <exclude name=".svn/*" />
    </fileset>
</copy>

<copy todir="${dest2.dir}" flatten="true">
    <fileset dir="${source2.dir}">
        <exclude name=".svn/*" />
    </fileset>
</copy>
